title: Prohibits service charges in sales of theater tickets in certain cases and exclusive contracts with ticket agents by operators of certain entertainment venues
summary: Prohibits service charges in sales of theater tickets in certain circumstances; removes expiration of (Chapter 704 of the laws of 1991) provisions relating to sale of theater tickets; prohibits exclusive contracts with ticket agents by operators of entertainment venues which are publicly owned or which receive direct or indirect public support.
